    • Connect

      public boolean Connect​(java.lang.String ipaddress)
      Method used to trigger the connection to the server if it receives an ip address valid (from CLI or GUI) and if the user is in the "wait for connection status"
      Parameters:
      ipaddress - ip address to use for connection typed by the user in the format ipaddress:port
      Returns:
      true if command has been executed otherwise false

    • Disconnect

      public boolean Disconnect()
      Method used to trigger the disconnection from the server if the user is in the "connected status" or the "keep connected status"
      Returns:
      true if command has been executed otherwise false

    • Register

      public boolean Register​(java.lang.String nickname)
      Method used to trigger the registration of the user if it's in the "keep connected status" and in the "unregistered status", if the user has entered a string not empty to use as the nickname
      Parameters:
      nickname - to register the user with
      Returns:
      true if command has been executed otherwise false

    • Deregister

      public boolean Deregister()
      Method to trigger the deregistration of the user if it's in the "keep connected status" and in the "registered status". It sets the nickname to an empty string again
      Returns:
      true if command has been executed otherwise false

    • SearchMatch

      public boolean SearchMatch​(int nPlayer)
      Method to trigger the search of the Match for a player. It sends a command to the server with the data required
      Parameters:
      nPlayer - number of players that will play the match that is being searched
      Returns:
      true if operation successful, false otherwise

      Returns:
      true if operation successful, false otherwise

      Method that sends a command to the server with the data required
      Parameters:
      chosenCell - Cell that is chosen to build on
      build_BorD - string indicating if the client asks the server to build a block (B) or a dome (D)
      Returns:
      true if operation successful, false otherwise
